name: Promotion Class: Sentinel
description:
Role: Melee Control

A master tactician who controls opponents in the battlefield and has dedicated their life to mastering the mace.

Stat Adjustments:
Final Mitigations Cap +15%
Movement Crowd Control +18%

Traits Granted:
Axe Mastery
Longsword Mastery
Mace Mastery
Short Sword Mastery
Buckler Mastery
Medium Shield Mastery
Plate Armor Proficiency

Enhancements:
Noble Blood: Now applies a Root.
Pursuit: Now Stuns the next target hit by a shield attack within the next 8 seconds.
Chain Attack: Now applies a Root.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Sentinel promotion class and prevents access to the Swordsman and Secutor promotion classes.
